images.title: Day View
images.description: A view showing the calendar information for a day and also for the previous and next couple of days.

images.title: Month View
images.description: A view showing the calendar entries for all days of a given month.

images.title: Week View
images.description: A view showing the calendar entries for all days of a week.

images.title: Year View
images.description: A view highlighting all days of a given year based on number of entries on that day.
